36.long: an untranslatable word (under the circumstances, in that case, anyhow), the general effect of which is to make a statement contingent, which would otherwise be definite: it is thus regularly used with the subjunctive mood.
I am struggling, striving (as in an athletic contest or warfare); I contend, as with an adversary.
I hand over, pledge, hand down, deliver, commit, commend, betray, abandon.
adv. (a) of time: just now, even now; just at hand, immediately, (b) of logical connection: now then, (c) in commands and appeals: at this instant.

36.brief: but, on the other hand, and
36.long: a weak adversative particle, generally placed second in its clause; but, on the other hand, and.
kingship, sovereignty, authority, rule, especially of God, both in the world, and in the hearts of men; hence: kingdom, in the concrete sense.

36.brief: hence, from this place, on this side and on that
36.long: hence, from this place, on this side and on that.

37.long: (denoting speech in progress), (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

37.brief: he, she, it, they, them, same
37.long: he, she, it, they, them, same.
a king, ruler, but in some passages clearly to be translated: emperor.
I answer, reply, take up the conversation.

that, since, because; may introduce direct discourse.

into, in, unto, to, upon, towards, for, among.

37.brief: I beget, bring forth, give birth to
37.long: I beget (of the male), (of the female) I bring forth, give birth to.
into, in, unto, to, upon, towards, for, among.
into, in, unto, to, upon, towards, for, among.
the world, universe; worldly affairs; the inhabitants of the world; adornment.
I witness, bear witness, give evidence, testify, give a good report.
truth, but not merely truth as spoken; truth of idea, reality, sincerity, truth in the moral sphere, divine truth revealed to man, straightforwardness.

37.brief: all, the whole, every kind of
37.long: all, the whole, every kind of.

37.brief: from out, out from among, from
37.long: from out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards.
truth, but not merely truth as spoken; truth of idea, reality, sincerity, truth in the moral sphere, divine truth revealed to man, straightforwardness.
I hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported.
a sound, noise, voice, language, dialect.

39.brief: but, on the other hand, and
39.long: a weak adversative particle, generally placed second in its clause; but, on the other hand, and.

39.brief: I release, let go, send away, divorce
39.long: I release, let go, send away, divorce, am rid; mid: I depart.

39.long: the feast of Passover, the Passover lamb.
